alert.note: Alert for Lancaster; Saunders; Seward (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 03 at 7:44PM CDT until October 03 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: The National Weather Service in Omaha has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Lancaster County in southeastern Nebraska... Central Seward County in southeastern Nebraska... Southwestern Saunders County in east central Nebraska... * Until 815 PM CDT. * At 743 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 2 miles east of Dwight to 3 miles south of Garland to 2 miles southwest of Milford, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Northwestern Lincoln, Seward, Milford, Ceresco, Valparaiso, Beaver Crossing, Malcolm, Garland, Pleasant Dale, Bee, Raymond, Davey, Goehner, Lincoln Airport, Emerald, Branched Oak State Recreation Area, and Pawnee State Recreation Area. This includes Interstate 80 in Nebraska between mile markers 371 and 403. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
